name: V_EHI_PTS_PB_TX_SET_INVOICE
description: This view filters out premium billing payment data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_TXSET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing transaction set.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the invoice on the transaction set.

columns.name: INV_TX_SET_AMT
columns.description: The invoice amount associated with the transaction set.

columns.name: INVOICE_PAYMENT_AMOUNT
columns.description: This field stores the payment amount for this invoice.

columns.name: INVOICE_ADJ_AMOUNT
columns.description: This field stores the adjustment amount for this invoice.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the invoice associated with the transaction set.
